title: Black Tux Jhin
body: Jhin would look great in a black tux like a 007 look.  He only has two skins. I've not seen any other skins that have that look. You could even make his gun appearance fit the look. The tux could have tails or not. Chromas could change the color of the tux.

replies.body: There's no way in hell he's getting another one this year.
or just put him in the debonair squad
